task_goal: Add a project called agent-b in linear

steps.description: Wait for the Linear application page to fully load and display the interface
Navigate to the Projects section by clicking on 'Projects' in the sidebar
Click the 'Add project' button to open the new project creation dialog
Enter 'agent-b' as the project name in the project name input field
Scroll down to find the create/save button to complete the project creation
Click the 'Create project' button to finalize the creation of the 'agent-b' project
Project 'agent-b' has been successfully created and added to Linear. The project now appears in the projects list and the creation is confirmed by the success notification.
